answer_found_by_llm: The parent process ID (PPID) of the suspicious process powershell.exe is 4120.
The second-stage payload file is c4d66f05-fbce-4100-b35c-7ae2aefd2039.tmp.
The shared directory accessed by the malicious process is davwwwroot.
The username under which the malicious process is running is root.
